snippet: An Essex County jury ruled against the New Jersey Division of Youth and Family Services in a case involving a 4-year-old boy who suffered brain damage allegedly caused by a beating.
abstract: Essex County jury hands down $166 million verdict against New Jersey Division of Youth and Family Services in case involving Jadiel Velesquez, 4-year-old boy who suffered severe brain damage after being beaten by his father, who pleaded guilty and is serving six-year prison term.
lead_paragraph: An Essex County jury ruled against the New Jersey Division of Youth and Family Services in a case involving a 4-year-old boy who suffered brain damage allegedly caused by a beating.

headline.main: Beaten New Jersey Boy, 4, Wins in Lawsuit
